title: 'go tool pprof' does not start pprof in interactive mode
body:
> What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Start a go program with enabled net/http/pprof.
2. $ go tool pprof http://localhost:6060/debug/pprof/heap

> What is the expected output?
pprof starts in interactive mode.

> What do you see instead?
$ go tool pprof http://localhost:6060/debug/pprof/heap
Read http://localhost:6060/debug/pprof/symbol
Fetching /pprof/heap profile from localhost:6060 to
  /home/dvyukov/pprof/rpc.test.1328719634.localhost-port6060.pprof.heap
Wrote profile to /home/dvyukov/pprof/rpc.test.1328719634.localhost-port6060.pprof.heap
Adjusting heap profiles for 1-in-524288 sampling rate
Welcome to pprof!  For help, type 'help'.
(pprof) $

That is, the pprof instantly exits.

>Please use labels and text to provide additional information.
linux, 11782:582fb3f6b4ce tip
